channel.title: Hey i need help about running a client with windows vista
channel.description: i am running on a 32 bit windows vista computer.... i run the client normaly (anyclient) and when i log onto the server. i can take two steps then the client closes and i get a notepad named "hs_err_pid3312" i have jdk update 14... i can use a 508 server fine and runescape but not a 317 ive made topics before about this but no one has helped. ive reloaded java but its still not working.

item.title: Hey i need help about running a client with windows vista

item.description:

i never posted in the wrong section, some stupid mod, locked my topic because he didnt know moonspell was a rsc server, and idc if i posted in the rs2 section
